title: Colonial Landmark
name: Raffles Hotel Le Royal
description: A historic icon since 1929 blending French colonial, Khmer, and Art Deco styles. Famous for its Elephant Bar and Khmer-inspired spa treatments.

title: Skyline Luxury
name: Rosewood Phnom Penh
description: Located at the top of Vattanac Capital Tower, this hotel offers sweeping views, sleek design, and world-class dining.

title: French Elegance
name: Sofitel Phnom Penh Phokeethra
description: Colonial-style luxury hotel with outdoor pool, award-winning restaurants, and a touch of French sophistication in the heart of the city.

title: Tranquil Retreat
name: Palace Gate Hotel & Resort
description: A serene escape near the Royal Palace with spacious rooms, rooftop pool, and attentive service in a lush garden setting.

title: Boutique Escape
name: The Balé Phnom Penh
description: A boutique riverside resort featuring intimate villas, lush gardens, and personalized hospitality away from the city bustle.

title: Modern Comfort
name: Oakwood Premier Phnom Penh
description: Stylish serviced apartments in the city center with rooftop pool, fitness facilities, and modern amenities for both short and extended stays.

title: Contemporary Luxury
name: Hyatt Regency Phnom Penh
description: A modern hotel with multiple dining options, full-service spa, and rooftop pool blending Cambodian hospitality with global standards.
